name: places/ChIJS_mnYZNYwokRTZqthCXg9cU
adrFormatAddress: 930 5th Ave #1e, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: Dr. William Spielfogel and the entire staff at Hamilton Foot and Ankle Associates on the upper East Side are beyond amazing. When you have an appointment, they will spend the whole scheduled period with you if need be; I know when I come in to see Dr. Spielfogel, he’s already reviewed the reasons for my coming in and my file. I never feel rushed, and he always asks if I have any other questions. He’s awesome, honest, informative, empathetic, with a calm demeanor and great sense of humor. Also, when he knew my medication would expensive on my insurance, he looked up what competing pharmacies charged and gave me resources to save money– saved me lots!

text.text: Dr. William Spielfogel and the entire staff at Hamilton Foot and Ankle Associates on the upper East Side are beyond amazing. When you have an appointment, they will spend the whole scheduled period with you if need be; I know when I come in to see Dr. Spielfogel, he’s already reviewed the reasons for my coming in and my file. I never feel rushed, and he always asks if I have any other questions. He’s awesome, honest, informative, empathetic, with a calm demeanor and great sense of humor. Also, when he knew my medication would expensive on my insurance, he looked up what competing pharmacies charged and gave me resources to save money– saved me lots!

originalText.text: We brought our 9-year-old daughter in for wart treatment, having previously visited Dr. Spielfogel a few times with positive experiences. The warts persisted, and Dr. Spielfogel opted to employ a more potent treatment approach and apply something "stronger." The bandaid did not stick well and came off multiple times, and each time Dr. Spielfogel reapplied the treatment. By the next day, our daughter developed three sizable blisters filled with fluid. This painful development not only caused her discomfort but also had a significant impact on her daily life. She couldn't wear her regular school shoes for a week, missing out on school gym classes. She could not partake in soccer practice nor her soccer tournament the next weekend (the treatment was on a Monday). The blisters persisted for over a week, prompting us to consult our pediatrician directly as a result of this complication. It took approximately ten days for our daughter to return to her normal self following the treatment. During the course of the ten days that our daughter had these blisters, we attempted to reach out to Dr. Spielfogel twice, leaving detailed voicemail messages with specific requests for a callback. Unfortunately, we received no response. Frustrated by the lack of communication and the ordeal our daughter had been through, we eventually decided to cancel her next appointment. We spoke to one of the administrators at the office, explaining our situation and once again requesting a callback from Dr. Spielfogel. Regrettably, our request went unanswered.

originalText.text: Warm reception and attentive to my needs and concerns.  A very inviting and caring environment.  Glad I've chosen Dr. Spielfogel as my podiatrist.

text.text: Warm reception and attentive to my needs and concerns.  A very inviting and caring environment.  Glad I've chosen Dr. Spielfogel as my podiatrist.

originalText.text: This facility is a place where I would recommend to anyone. The doctor is kind and made me feel comfortable but the prize of this practice is the front desk young lady Angie. Now this women knows her job she was funny,nice and friendly. She is a huge reason why I will continue there and recommend to everyone. I'm making an appointment for my son he's in need of a friendly facility for is foot condition. What better place I say.

originalText.text: Dr. Spielfogel was through and efficient. He was able to correctly diagnose my foot problem and treated well. He is smart and personable. He is prepared before he sees me, (review my case and MRI film prior). I highly recommend him. And already did so to my friends and family.
